name: God Eater Off Shot: Shio-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 5
name_original: God Eater Off Shot: Shio-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 5
description:
God Eater Off Shot: Shio-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 5 is an arcade game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It came out on 25-02-2016. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game.
God Eater Off Shot: Shio-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 5 is available on PlayStation 4.
